excerpt: Bring your burning questions as we chat with four recruiters from three great companies to discover the ins and outs of navigating your job search with the help of an IT recruiter.
markdown:
## Details

// March 25, 2021 //\
\
Hiring UX: Insights from recruiters\
\
In this meeting we bring to you a very special group of folk for these very trying times. Bring your burning questions as we chat with four recruiters from three great companies to discover the ins and outs of navigating your job search with the help of an IT recruiter. We already have some great questions that they'll be working on answering for us, but afterwards we'll be opening up the lines for more from you!\
\
If you have a question that you think might require some more thought, you can let us know your question in your RSVP.\
\
Hereâ€™s the lowdown on our night with the UX Recruiter Panel:\
1. Book off your evening on March 25, 2021, 8:30 - 9:30 pm\
2. Join via Zoom\
3. Bring your popcorn and questions\
4. Get ready for a good chat!
title: Hiring UX: Insights from recruiters
